title: Multimodal English Education for Dyeing and Processing Technology Majors' Job Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading/writing proficiency and understanding of fundamental terminology in dyeing/processing fields
context.additional_context: Job-specific training for pre-service/in-service teachers combining science curricula (dyeing and processing technology) with English communication skills

learning_goals: Learners can interpret discipline-related English discourse with over 80% accuracy by analyzing multimodal materials (text/image/video)
Learners can recreate role-play scenarios of English workplace situations related to dyeing processes (e.g., quality review meetings) through virtual workshop simulations
Learners can produce English reports and presentation materials based on multimodal case studies of problems occurring in actual industrial settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
